title: $:/plugins/telmiger/listreveal
author: Thomas Elmiger
name: Listreveal
text:
{ "tiddlers": { "01 Listreveal List Setup": { "title": "01 Listreveal List Setup", "created": "20170222232934553", "creator": "Thomas Elmiger", "modified": "20190426075256075", "modifier": "Thomas Elmiger", "tags": "Listreveal", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "Explanations for the code of $:/plugins/telmiger/listreveal/readme – you can clone the linked tiddler and adapt it step by step to create your own listreveal project. The filter statement is a good point to start: ``` <$set name="listfilter" value="""[tag[Listreveal]!is[system]sort[title]]""">
    <$list filter=<>> ``` Always use a variable called //listfilter// to create your list. The list-based tag manager (see [[03 Context Tagging]]) is depending on this convention. It is recommended to use the CSS classes you see in this example – add your own to change the looks. ``` <$set name="tidTitle" value={{!!title}}>
  • <$link to={{!!title}}><$view field="title"/> ``` The styling relies on [[CSS3 flexbox|https://scotch.io/tutorials/a-visual-guide-to-css3-flexbox-properties]]. These spans help to make your list as mobile friendly as possible. ``` <> ``` This macro produces an edit button. It shows the tiddler’s modified date when the mouse hovers over it. ``` <$wikify name="cl" text=<> > <$wikify name="tt" text=<> > <$macrocall $name="listrevealButton" title=<> tooltip=<> close=<>/> ``` This macrocall produces the button on the right side that opens and closes the tiddlers. The variables //cl// and //tt// get predefined translations from the language tiddlers that are part of this plugin. You can replace the tooltip for opening (attribute //tooltip//) and closing (attribute //close//) with your own texts. ``` <$wikify name="tpl" text=<> > <$macrocall $name="listrevealContent" title=<> datetime=<>/> ``` This macrocall produces the text content and some details of your tiddler. Again the variable //tpl// gets a predefined translation from the integrated language tiddlers. It is used as a [[date format template|http://tiddlywiki.com/#DateFormat]] when the created and modified timestamps of the tiddler are displayed. This attribute is optional. //tidTitle// is the variable for the title of your list elements (your tiddlers). It is set at the beginning (see second snippet). ```
``` The whole list is presented as an unordered HTML list `
    ` with tiddlers as list items `
  • `." }, "02 Edit Button": { "title": "02 Edit Button", "created": "20170222233632994", "creator": "Thomas Elmiger", "modified": "20190426075256069", "modifier": "Thomas Elmiger", "tags": "Listreveal", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "Optionally you can add a lock/unlock button to switch your list into edit mode (all listreveal lists in your wiki to be precise). This presents the tiddler content in an editor field where you can change it using wikitext formatting. ``` Use this button to enable editing: <> ``` Add your own parameter `class:"your-class"` for styling and positioning via CSS. The icon has a so called dirty indicator implemented: it turns red if you have unsaved changes." }, "03 Context Tagging": { "title": "03 Context Tagging", "created": "20170224195102124", "creator": "Thomas Elmiger", "modified": "20190426075256065", "modifier": "Thomas Elmiger", "tags": "Listreveal", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "When you look inside a tiddler in the list using the ellipsis (…) button on the right, you see the tiddler’s tags, text and timestamps. {{$:/core/images/tag-button}} The tags can be changed using the tag label icon. A unique feature called context tagging or list-based tagging appears in a popup. From there you are able to add suggested tags based on the other tiddlers in your list or remove single tags from the tiddler. " }, "04 Checklists": { "title": "04 Checklists", "created": "20170224200058192", "creator": "Thomas Elmiger", "modified": "20190426075256060", "modifier": "Thomas Elmiger", "priority": "2", "tags": "Listreveal Usability Plugins", "todo-deadline": "20160912220000000", "todo-done": "20160917214708", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "This plugin comes with CSS to support checklists generated via a plugin by Tony Grosinger – indentation and the display of user interface elements to add and delete items should be optimized for use inside of listreveal lists. [ ] Install the plugin from https://grosinger.net/tw5-checklist/ [ ] Make your first checklist [x] Read these hints on checklists" }, "05 Translations": { "title": "05 Translations", "created": "20170224202239839", "creator": "Thomas Elmiger", "modified": "20190426075256055", "modifier": "Thomas Elmiger", "tags": "Listreveal Translation", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "The following language tiddlers are shipped with this plugin:
      <$list filter="""[all[tiddlers+shadows]prefix[$:/plugins/telmiger/lib/languages/]sort[]]""">
    • {{##ID}}: <$link to={{!!title}}><$view field="title"/>
    Set your language in $:/plugins/telmiger/lib/language (I hope I will find a way to use the language from the TW settings in the future). To implement a new language you could clone and adapt one of them. They are used for other plugins too, this is why they contain way more text than needed for listreveal. " }, "$:/plugins/telmiger/lib/dates-then": { "title": "$:/plugins/telmiger/lib/dates-then", "created": "20170705203414697", "creator": "Thomas Elmiger", "example-1": "20001231230000000", "modified": "20190426075256047", "modifier": "Thomas Elmiger", "tags": "[[ToDo Addons]] $:/tags/Macro", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "\define yearValue(field,tiddler) <> \define monthValue(field,tiddler) <> \define dayValue(field,tiddler) <> \define hoursValue(field,tiddler) <> \define minutesValue(field,tiddler) <> \define secondsValue(field,tiddler) <> \define dateValue(template:"YYYY-0MM-0DD",field:"modified",tiddler) <$set name="tid" filter="""[field:title[$tiddler$]]""" value="""$tiddler$""" emptyValue=<>><$view tiddler=<> field="""$field$""" format="date" template="""$template$"""/> \end Syntax: `<>` Result: <> " }, "$:/plugins/telmiger/lib/dates": { "title": "$:/plugins/telmiger/lib/dates", "created": "20170627092117795", "creator": "Thomas Elmiger", "modified": "20190426075256051", "modifier": "Thomas Elmiger", "tags": "[[ToDo Addons]] $:/tags/Macro", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "\define yearsSince(date-field:"modified",tiddler) <> \end \define monthsSince(date-field:"modified",tiddler) <$vars df="""$date-field$""" tid="""$tiddler$"""><$wikify name="years" text="""<$macrocall $name="yearsDiff" date-field=<> tiddler=<>/>"""> <$wikify name="yearsM" text='<$macrocall $name="rpn" a=<> b=12 operation="*"/>'> <$wikify name="months" text="""<$macrocall $name="monthsDiff"date-field=<> tiddler=<>/>"""> <$macrocall $name="rpn" a=<> b=<>/> \end \define daysSince(date-field:"modified",tiddler) <> \end \define hoursSince(date-field:"modified",tiddler) <$vars df="""$date-field$""" tid="""$tiddler$"""><$wikify name="days" text="""<$macrocall $name="daysSince" date-field=<> tiddler=<>/>"""> <$wikify name="daysH" text='<$macrocall $name="rpn" a=<> b="24" operation="*"/>'> <$wikify name="hours" text="""<$macrocall $name="hoursDiff" date-field=<> tiddler=<>/>"""> <$macrocall $name="rpn" a=<> b=<>/> \end \define minutesSince(date-field:"modified",tiddler) <$vars df="""$date-field$""" tid="""$tiddler$"""><$wikify name="hours" text="""<$macrocall $name="hoursSince" date-field=<> tiddler=<>/>"""><$wikify name="hoursM" text='<$macrocall $name="rpn" a=<> b="60" operation="*"/>'><$wikify name="minutes" text="""<$macrocall $name="minutesDiff" date-field=<> tiddler=<>/>"""><$macrocall $name="rpn" a=<> b=<>/> \end \define hoursMinutesSince(date-field:"modified",tiddler) <$vars df="""$date-field$""" tid="""$tiddler$"""><$wikify name="minutes" text="""<$macrocall $name="minutesSince" date-field=<> tiddler=<>/>"""><$macrocall $name="rpn" a=<> b=60 operation="/" precision="f"/> h <$macrocall $name="rpn" a=<> b=60 operation="%"/> m \end \define minutesTo(date-field:"modified",tiddler) <$vars df="""$date-field$""" tid="""$tiddler$"""><$wikify name="minutes" text="""<$macrocall $name="minutesSince" date-field=<> tiddler=<>/>"""><$wikify name="result" text='<$macrocall $name="rpn" a=<> b="-1" operation="*"/>'><> \end \define hoursTo(date-field:"modified",tiddler) <$vars df="""$date-field$""" tid="""$tiddler$"""><$wikify name="hours" text="""<$macrocall $name="hoursSince" date-field=<> tiddler=<>/>"""><$wikify name="result" text='<$macrocall $name="rpn" a=<> b="-1" operation="*"/>'><> \end \define yearsDiff(date-field:"modified",tiddler) <$vars df="""$date-field$""" tid="""$tiddler$"""><$wikify name="a" text='<>'><$wikify name="b" text="""<$macrocall $name="yearValue" field=<> tiddler=<>/>"""><$macrocall $name="rpn" a=<> b=<> operation="-"/> \end \define monthsDiff(date-field:"modified",tiddler) <$vars df="""$date-field$""" tid="""$tiddler$"""><$wikify name="a" text='<>'><$wikify name="b" text="""<$macrocall $name="monthValue" field=<> tiddler=<>/>"""><$macrocall $name="rpn" a=<> b=<> operation="-"/> \end \define daysDiff(date-field:"modified",tiddler) <$vars df="""$date-field$""" tid="""$tiddler$"""><$wikify name="a" text='<>'><$wikify name="b" text="""<$macrocall $name="dayValue" field=<> tiddler=<>/>"""><$macrocall $name="rpn" a=<> b=<> operation="-"/> \end \define hoursDiff(date-field:"modified",tiddler) <$vars df="""$date-field$""" tid="""$tiddler$"""><$wikify name="a" text='<>'><$wikify name="b" text="""<$macrocall $name="hoursValue" field=<> tiddler=<>/>"""><$macrocall $name="rpn" a=<> b=<> operation="-"/> \end \define minutesDiff(date-field:"modified",tiddler) <$vars df="""$date-field$""" tid="""$tiddler$"""><$set name="update-everything-now" value=<>><$wikify name="a" text="<>"><$wikify name="b" text="<$macrocall $name=minutesValue field=<> tiddler=<>/>"><$macrocall $name="rpn" a=<> b=<> operation="-"/> \end " }, "$:/plugins/telmiger/lib/entities": { "title": "modified": "20190426075256142", "modifier": "Thomas Elmiger", "priority": "2", "tags": "ToDoDone ToDoComponents $:/tags/Macro", "todo-deadline": "", "todo-done": "20160820234641 20160821004547", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "\define telang(term) <$transclude tiddler={{$:/plugins/telmiger/lib/language}} index="$term$"><$transclude tiddler="$:/plugins/telmiger/lib/languages/en-GB" index="$term$"/> \end " }, "$:/plugins/telmiger/lib/telements/buttons": { "title": "$:/plugins/telmiger/lib/telements/buttons", "created": "20160816192735231", "creator": "Thomas Elmiger", "list": "3 1 2", "modified": "20190426075256129", "modifier": "Thomas Elmiger", "prio": "", "tags": "ToDoComponents $:/tags/Macro MyMacros Listreveal", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "\define teBtnSave(class:"te-btn-big") <$wikify name="myclass" text="te-btn-save $class$ <>"> <$button message="tm-save-wiki" param={{$:/config/SaveWikiButton/Template}} tooltip={{$:/language/Buttons/SaveWiki/Hint}} aria-label={{$:/language/Buttons/SaveWiki/Caption}} class=<>> {{$:/core/images/save-button}} \end \define teBtnDelete(class:"") <$vars btnclass="te-btn-action te-btn-delete $class$"> <$button message="tm-delete-tiddler" tooltip={{$:/language/Buttons/Delete/Hint}} aria-label={{$:/language/Buttons/Delete/Caption}} class=<>> {{$:/core/images/delete-button}} \end \define teBtnHint(btntext,message,tooltip,tip,class:"") <$set name="btnclass" value="te-hint $class$"> <$button class=<> tooltip="""$tooltip$""" message="$message$"> $btntext$ $tip$ \end \define teBtnTagListops(btntext,add-remove,tooltip,tip:"_false_",class:"") <$vars tip="""$tip$""" btnclass="te-btn-action te-tag-listops $class$"> <$set name="mytip" filter="[removeprefix[_false_]]" emptyValue="""$tip$"""> <$button class=<> tooltip="""$tooltip$"""> <> <$action-listops $tags="$add-remove$" /> <> $btntext$ <> \end \define teBtnEdit(sendmessage:"tm-edit-tiddler",class:"") <$wikify name="tt" text=<>> <$button tooltip=<> class="te-btn-action te-edit $class$"> <$action-sendmessage $message="$sendmessage$" $param=<> /> {{$:/core/images/edit-button}} \end \define teBtnEditShowModified(sendmessage:"tm-edit-tiddler",class:"") <$wikify name="tt" text=<>> <$button tooltip=<> class="te-btn-action te-edit $class$"> <$action-sendmessage $message="$sendmessage$" $param=<> /> {{$:/core/images/edit-button}}<$view tiddler=<> field="modified" format="date" template="YYYY-0MM-0DD 0hh:0mm"/> \end \define priority="""$priority$"""> <$set name="nextprio" filter="""[list[$prioritylist$]nth[$priority$]]"""> <$wikify name="next" text="$tooltip$ <>"> <$button tooltip=<> class="te-btn-action te-prio prio$priority$ $class$"> <$action-listops $field="priority" $filter=<>/> <> \end \define teBtnPrioPopup(tiddler,btntext,priority,prioritylist:"$:/plugins/telmiger/lib/telements/buttons",tooltip:"change priority",class:"") <$vars btntext="""$btntext$""" priority="""$priority$"""> <$set name="qualstate" value=<> > <$reveal type="nomatch" state=<> text="show" class="te-btn-reveal"> <$button tooltip="""$tooltip$""" set=<> setTo="show" class="te-btn-action te-prio prio$priority$ $class$"> <> <$reveal type="match" state=<> text="show" class="te-btn-reveal"> <$button tooltip="close popup" class="te-btn-action te-prio prio$priority$ $class$"> <$action-deletetiddler $tiddler=<>/> <> <$reveal type="match" state=<> text="show"> <$wikify name="tt" text="set prio"> <$macrocall $name="tePrioList" tiddler="""$tiddler$""" icon="{{$:/core/images/star-filled}}" priorityfield="priority" prioritylist="""$prioritylist$""" tooltip=<> class="" state=<>/> \end \define tePrioList(tiddler,prioritylist:"_false_",priorityfield:"_false_",icon:"{{$:/core/images/star-filled}}",state) <$vars priotid="""$prioritylist$""" tid="""$tiddler$"""> <$set name="prioOld" filter="[get[$priorityfield$]]">
      <$list filter="[listsort[]] -[]" variable="prio" emptyValue="error: no priorities in list field of $tiddler$">
    • <$macrocall $name="teBtnPrioSet" tiddler=<> priority=<> priorityfield="""$priorityfield$""" tooltip="set as prio" icon="""$icon$""" class="" state="""$state$"""/>
    \end \define teBtnPrioSet(tiddler,priority,priorityfield,tooltip,icon,class:"",state) <$vars prio="""$priority$""" qualstate="""$state$"""> <$button tooltip="""$tooltip$""" class="te-btn-action te-prio prio$priority$ $class$"> <> <$action-listops $tiddler="""$tiddler$""" $field=$priorityfield$ $filter=<>/> <> <$action-deletetiddler $tiddler=<>/> <>$icon$ \end \define teBtnClone(tiddler,class:"") <$button message="tm-new-tiddler" param="""$tiddler$""" tooltip={{$:/language/Buttons/Clone/Hint}} aria-label={{$:/language/Buttons/Clone/Caption}} class="te-btn-action te-clone $class$"> {{$:/core/images/clone-button}} \end \define teBtnIcons(label,icon,hovericon) """$label$""" <$transclude tiddler="""$icon$"""/> <$transclude tiddler="""$hovericon$"""/> \end \define teTimestampPause() <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/temp/te/TimestampBefore" $value={{$:/config/TimestampDisable}}/> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/config/TimestampDisable" $value="yes"/> \end \define teTimestampResume() <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/config/TimestampDisable" $value={{$:/temp/te/TimestampBefore}}/> \end " }, "$:/plugins/telmiger/lib/telements/story-nav": { "title": "$:/plugins/telmiger/lib/telements/story-nav", "created": "20180505155058918", "creator": "Thomas Elmiger", "modified": "20190426075256124", "modifier": "Thomas Elmiger", "tags": "", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "
    <$list filter="[all[current]next[$:/StoryList]]"> <$button to={{!!title}} tooltip="next">{{$:/core/images/down-arrow}} <$list filter="[all[current]previous[$:/StoryList]]"> <$button to={{!!title}} tooltip="previous">{{$:/core/images/up-arrow}}
    " }, "$:/plugins/telmiger/lib/telements-print.css": { "title": "$:/plugins/telmiger/lib/telements-print.css", "created": "20170201215840974", "creator": "Thomas Elmiger", "modified": "20190426075256138", "modifier": "Thomas Elmiger", "tags": "$:/tags/Stylesheet Listreveal ToDoComponents", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "/* print optimisation for (t)elements */ @media print { .te-noprint, .te-btn-action, .te-btn-action.muted, .te-btn-big, .te-edit, .te-to-top { display: none; } /* header */ header { background-color: transparent; } /* show buttons? reset display */ /* big buttons */ /* action buttons */ .te-btn-action.todo-deadline, .te-btn-action.te-prio { display: initial; } .te-btn-action.te-prio.prio1 span.te-prionr, .te-btn-action.te-prio.prio1 { color: #efefef; } .te-btn-action.te-prio span.te-prionr, .te-btn-action.te-prio.prio2 span.te-prionr, .te-btn-action.te-prio.prio3 span.te-prionr, .te-btn-action.te-prio.prio4 span.te-prionr { color: #ddd; } .te-btn-action.te-prio { background-color: #ddd; border: 3px solid black; } .te-btn-action.te-prio.prio2 { background-color: #bbb; } .te-btn-action.te-prio.prio3 { background-color: #999; } .te-btn-action.te-prio.prio4 { background-color: #777; } /* date picker button */ .te-btn-action.deadline span svg { opacity: 0.66; } /* text */ /* meta info */ /* images */ .te-created svg, .te-modified svg { opacity: 0.6; } /* **** END of print optimisation **** */ } " }, "$:/plugins/telmiger/lib/telements.css": { "title": "$:/plugins/telmiger/lib/telements.css", "created": "20160816210925818", "creator": "Thomas Elmiger", "modified": "20190426075256134", "modifier": "Thomas Elmiger", "tags": "$:/tags/Stylesheet ToDoComponents Listreveal", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "/* library of reusable (t)elements */ /* header */ header { background-color: <>; padding: 10px; margin: 0 0 0 -10px; } /* te-summary as seen in extract macro */ .te-summary { width: 100%; background-color: <>; } /* flexbox layout */ .te-flex-content { width: 100%; } .te-flex-item { display: flex; flex-direction: row; flex-wrap: wrap; justify-content: space-between; align-items: flex-start; height: auto; } .te-flex-half-full { flex-grow: 1; } .te-flex-left { justify-content: flex-start; } .te-flex-right { justify-content: flex-end; } h2 .te-flex-right, h2 .te-flex-right, h3 .te-flex-right { justify-content: flex-end; width: 33%; max-width: 66%; } .te-tiddler-info { order: 90; margin-top: 2rem; } /* lists */ .te-list { list-style: outside none none; margin: 0 0 1rem 0; padding: 0; width: 100%; max-width: 100%; } .te-list > li { line-height: 1.5; } .te-list > li { border-top: 1px solid; border-color: <>; } .te-list > li:last-of-type { border-bottom: 1px solid; } .te-list .te-flex-item a.tc-tiddlylink-resolves { flex-grow: 3; max-width: 100%; } .te-list-icon { width: 1em; height: 1em; margin-right: .5rem; } /* buttons */ /* big buttons */ button.te-btn-big, .te-btn-big button { border-radius: 0; margin: 0; padding: 0; background: none; display: inline-block; position: relative; vertical-align: middle; top: -4px; width: 3rem; height: 2rem; margin-left: .5rem; border-radius: .25rem; border: 1px solid; border-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); background-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.05); font-size: 1.25rem; text-align: center; } button.te-btn-big:hover, span.te-btn-big button:hover { background-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1); } /* standard save button */ button.te-btn-save svg { height: 1.25rem; top: -1px; position: relative; } /* color overlay hack */ button.te-btn-big.te-create::before { background-color: <>; content: ""; position: absolute; top: 0; left: 0; width: 100%; height: 100%; opacity: 0.33; } button:hover.te-btn-big.te-create::before { opacity: 0.66; } .te-btn-big.unlocked { background-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1); } .te-btn-big.unlocked:hover { background-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.05); } .te-btn-big.te-create { background-color: unset; } .te-btn-big .tc-image-locked-padlock, .te-btn-big .tc-image-unlocked-padlock { margin-bottom: 3px; } .te-btn-big .tc-image-new-button { margin-bottom: 2px; margin-top: 1px; } .te-btn-big .tc-image-unfold, .te-btn-big .tc-image-fold { margin-top: 3px; } /* action buttons */ button.te-btn-action { border: none; margin: 0; padding: 0; background: none; font-size: 1em; border-radius: .25rem; height: 1.66rem; width: 1.66rem; margin-right: .25rem; } .te-btn-action svg { fill: <>; } .te-btn-action.muted svg { opacity:0.4; } .te-list .te-btn-action.muted svg { opacity:0.4; } .te-list .te-btn-action:hover svg { opacity:0.6; } .te-btn-action.addtag svg { height: 1.5em; width: 1.5em; } .te-btn-action.te-edit svg { height: 1.25em; width: 1.25em; margin-bottom: -2px; } .te-btn-action.te-filter { position: absolute; left: calc(50% - 1rem); } .te-btn-action.te-filter:not(.muted) svg { fill: <>; } .te-btn-action.te-prio { background-color: #777; width: calc(1.66rem - 6px); height: calc(1.66rem - 6px); border: 3px solid white; box-sizing: content-box; border-radius: .25rem; line-height: 1; } .te-btn-action.te-prio.prio2 { background-color: #999; } .te-btn-action.te-prio.prio3 { background-color: #bbb; } .te-btn-action.te-prio.prio4 { background-color: #ddd; } /* action button in te-tip */ .te-tip .te-btn-action { margin-left: 0.4em; padding-bottom: 25px; } /* delete button and delete popup */ .te-btn-delete svg.tc-image-delete-button { width: 1.1em; height: 1.45em; } /* popup action buttons */ .te-popup-action { background: none; border: none; padding: 0; } /* date picker button */ .te-btn-action.todo-deadline { display: inline-block; text-align: center; width: 1.66rem; height: 1.66rem; margin-right: .25rem; border-radius: .25rem; } .te-btn-action.todo-deadline:hover { cursor: pointer; } .te-btn-action.todo-deadline span svg { height: 1.25rem; width: 1.25rem; margin-top: 3px; opacity: 0.6; } /* label and icons */ .te-btn-label { font-size: 0; height: 1px; overflow: hidden; display: block; } .te-btn-icon { display: block; } button:hover .te-btn-icon { display: none; } .te-btn-hovericon { display: none; } button:hover .te-btn-hovericon { display: block; } /* urgent indicators */ .te-btn-action .urgent { display: table-cell; position: relative; margin-left: 0; left: 0em; top: -10px; font-size: 0.75em; line-height: 1.25; padding: 0 0.1em 0 0.1em; max-width: 3.25em; } .urgent.late { background-color: red; color: white; } .urgent.today { background-color: yellow; color: red; } /* priority buttons */ .te-btn-action.te-prio svg { position: relative; height: 1.65rem; width: 1.5rem; opacity: 0; margin-top: -2.25rem; } .te-btn-action.te-prio:hover svg { opacity: 0.1; } .te-btn-action .te-prionr { position: relative; color: #fefefe; font-size: 1.25rem; font-weight: 600; } .te-btn-action.te-prio.prio1 .te-prionr, .te-btn-action.te-prio.prio2 .te-prionr, .te-btn-action.te-prio.prio3 .te-prionr { color: #eee; } .te-prio-list { list-style: none; position: absolute; z-index: 25; border: 1px solid; border-radius: 4px; border-color: <>; background-color: <>; } .te-list .te-prio-list { width: 2.75rem; margin: 1.55rem 0 0 -2.5rem; padding: .5rem .5rem .25rem .5rem; } .te-list .te-prio-list li { line-height: 1; margin-top: 0; margin-bottom: 0; padding-top: 0; padding-bottom: 0; } .te-btn-reveal.tc-reveal { height: 1em; } .te-linkbutton { color: <>; background-color: transparent; border: 0; } /* checked icon */ .te-item-checked svg { position: relative; top: .25rem; margin-right: .5rem; } /* text */ .te-text { margin: 0 0.5rem 0 0.5rem; } .te-text.right { margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 0.5em; right: 6em; } /* popup tip */ .te-tip { position: absolute; display: none; font-size: 0.875rem; line-height: 1.5; white-space: nowrap; padding: 0.1rem 0.5rem 0.2rem 0.5rem; border-radius: 3px; color: <>; border-color: <>; background-color: <>; } .te-btn-big:hover .te-tip { margin-left: -8em; margin-top: -1.66em; z-index: 500; display: unset; } .te-btn-action:hover .te-tip, .te-created:hover .te-tip, .te-modified:hover .te-tip { margin-left: -0.4em; margin-top: -1.66rem; z-index: 500; display: unset; } a:hover .te-tip, .te-text:hover .te-tip { display: inline-grid; margin-left: -0.8em; margin-top: -0.75em; z-index: 100; text-align: center; } .te-tip:hover span .te-tip, .te-text:hover .te-tip button .te-tip, .te-tip:hover button .te-tip { display: none; } .te-tip:hover span:hover .te-tip, .te-tip:hover button:hover .te-tip { margin-top: -1.25em; z-index: 101; display: unset; } .te-tip span span svg { margin-top: 0.25em; } /* meta info */ .te-created, .te-modified { position: relative; } /* images */ .te-created svg, .te-modified svg { max-height: 1.25em; opacity: 0.6; margin-bottom: -0.2em; } /* very small screens */ @media (max-width: 500px) { .te-btn-action { margin: 0.3em 0.8em 0 0.5em; } }" }, "$:/plugins/telmiger/listreveal/configuration": { "title": "$:/plugins/telmiger/listreveal/configuration", "created": "20180423195037840", "creator": "Thomas Elmiger", "modified": "20190426075256120", "modifier": "Thomas Elmiger", "tags": "ToDoComponents", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "!! Configuration !!! Language
    Choose your language <$select tiddler="$:/plugins/telmiger/lib/language" field="text"> <$list filter="""[all[shadows+tiddlers]removeprefix[$:/plugins/telmiger/lib/languages/]sort[]]""" variable="code"> <$wikify name="lang" text="$:/plugins/telmiger/lib/languages/<>"> ISO code (language-country)
    Active: {{$:/plugins/telmiger/lib/language}} --- !!! Translations, date and time format # Clone one of the following language tiddlers, set a new ending for the title, e.g. …/de-foo (do not change the rest of the title):
      <$list filter="[all[shadows+tiddlers]prefix[$:/plugins/telmiger/lib/languages/]]">
    • <>
    # Adapt the [[formatting of dates and time|http://tiddlywiki.com/#DateFormat]], translate terms if desired. # Select your newly created language in the dropdown above. " }, "$:/plugins/telmiger/listreveal/icon": { "title": "$:/plugins/telmiger/listreveal/icon", "created": "20170224201850969", "modified": "20190426075256116", "tags": "", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": " " }, "$:/plugins/telmiger/listreveal/lr-search": { "title": "$:/plugins/telmiger/listreveal/lr-search", "created": "20180429101307450", "creator": "Thomas Elmiger", "datetime": "", "modified": "20190426075256108", "modifier": "Thomas Elmiger", "tags": "$:/tags/Macro Listreveal", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "\define listrevealSearch(id:"search",focus:"false") <$vars tagsearchTiddler="$:/config/listreveal/Search/$id$"> <$wikify name="placeholder" text=<> >
    <$edit-text tiddler=<> type="search" tag="input" focus=$focus$ placeholder=<> default=""/> <$reveal state=<> type="nomatch" text=""> <$wikify name="reset" text=<> > <$button tooltip=<> class="tc-btn-invisible"> <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> text="" /> {{$:/core/images/close-button}}
    \end \define listrevealProjectSelect(mastertag:"ToDo") <$wikify name="tagfilter" text="""<> +[tags[]sort[title]] -[[$mastertag$]]""">
    <$select tiddler='$:/config/listreveal/ProjectSelect/$mastertag$'> <$list filter=<>>
    \end \define resultCounter(textafter:"") <$set name="resultCount" value='<$count filter="""$(listfilter)$"""/>'> {{$:/language/Search/Matches}} $textafter$ \end " }, "$:/plugins/telmiger/listreveal/lr.css": { "title": "$:/plugins/telmiger/listreveal/lr.css", "created": "20160816052415397", "creator": "Thomas Elmiger", "modified": "20190426075256103", "modifier": "Thomas Elmiger", "tags": "$:/tags/Stylesheet Listreveal ToDoComponents", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "/* listreveal styles */ /* === optimised for: ul class="te-list" and li class="te-flex-item" === */ /* list RENAME listreveal-list? */ ul.te-list > li { padding-top: calc(.125rem + 1px); padding-left: .5rem; padding-right: .25rem; padding-bottom: 0; color: <>; background-color: transparent; } ul.te-list > li > * { padding-bottom: 1px; } ul.te-list > li:hover { background-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.05); } /* link hack for Safari Mobile: */ .te-list .te-flex-item a.tc-tiddlylink-resolves { word-break: break-all; } @media (min-width: 28rem) { .te-list .te-flex-item a.tc-tiddlylink-resolves { word-break: inherit; } } /* buttons */ .te-list .listreveal-btn-show { border: 1px solid; border-radius: 0; border-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5); padding: 0; background: none; margin: 0 0.125rem 0.1rem 0.5rem; height: 1.5rem; width: 2.35rem; color: <>; background-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.05); } .listreveal-btn-show:hover { background-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1); } .te-list .listreveal-btn-hide { border: 1px solid; border-bottom-width: 0; border-radius: 0; border-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5); padding: 0; background: none; margin: 0 0.125rem 0 0.25rem; width: 2.60rem; height: 1.66rem; color: <>; background-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.03); } .listreveal-btn-hide:hover { background-color: <>; } /* tiddler content */ .listreveal-open { margin-left: -.5rem; margin-right: -.25rem; width: calc(100% + .75rem); height: auto; margin-bottom: -1px; transition: none 0s ease 0s; } .listreveal-content { display: block; color: <>; border: none; line-height: 1.5; padding: 1rem; -webkit-animation: expanditem 1s ease-in-out 0s running; animation-name: expanditem; animation-duration: 1s; animation-timing-function: ease-in-out; animation-delay: 0s; animation-iteration-count: 1; animation-direction: normal; } /* edit mode */ .listreveal-edit-text { width: 100%; border: 1px solid gray; padding: 1em; } /* edit caption */ .lr-set-caption input { width: 20rem; } /* separate colour for title than caption */ a .lr-is-title { color: <>; } /* meta info */ .listreveal-tags, .listreveal-meta { font-size: 0.875rem; border-top: 0; border-bottom: 0; color: <<--black .5>>; fill: <<--black .5>>; margin-top: 0; margin-bottom: 0; padding: .25rem; } .listreveal-tags { border-top: 1px solid; border-bottom: 1px solid; border-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5); padding-bottom: 0; } .listreveal-meta { border-top: 1px solid; border-bottom: none; border-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5); padding-right: 0.5rem; } .listreveal-meta svg { margin-right: 0.25rem; } /* tags info */ .listreveal-tags .te-tags span.tc-tag-label:hover { } .listreveal-tags .te-tags span.tc-tag-label { } .listreveal-tags .tc-block-dropdown { position: absolute; padding: .75rem .5rem 0 .5rem; margin-top: -.25rem; margin-right: 1rem; max-width: 100%; } .lr-tag-popup { margin-left: 1em; } .lr-tag-popup ul { margin: 0; padding: 0 1em 1em 0; line-height: 1.75; list-style: none; font-weight: 600; } .lr-tag-popup ul li:hover{ color: <>; } .lr-tag-popup ul.lr-tags-remove li:hover{ color: <>; } .lr-tags-add li button::before { content: "+ "; font-size: 1.2em; color: <>; } .lr-tags-remove li button::before { content: "×  "; font-size: 1.2em; color: <>; } @media (max-width: 960px) { } /* listreveal animation */ @keyframes expanditem { 0% { height: 0; opacity: 0; } 80.0% { height: 60%; opacity: 0.9; } 100.0% { height: 100%; opacity: 1; } } @-webkit-keyframes expanditem { 0% { height: 0; opacity: 0; } 100.0% { height: 100%; opacity: 1; } }" }, "$:/plugins/telmiger/listreveal/lr": { "title": "$:/plugins/telmiger/listreveal/lr", "created": "20160811053433681", "creator": "Thomas Elmiger", "datetime": "", "modified": "20190426075256112", "modifier": "Thomas Elmiger", "tags": "$:/tags/Macro Listreveal", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "\define listrevealButton(title,tooltip:"Details",close:"Close",class:"") <$vars showclass="""listreveal-btn-show te-noprint $class$""" hideclass="""listreveal-btn-hide te-noprint $class$"""> <$set name="qualstate" value=<> > <$reveal type="nomatch" state=<> text="visible" animate="yes" class="listreveal"> <$button set=<> setTo="visible" class=<> tooltip="$tooltip$">… <$reveal type="match" state=<> text="visible" animate="yes" class="listreveal"> <$button class=<> tooltip="$close$">×<$action-deletetiddler $tiddler=<> /> \end \define listrevealContent(title,mode:"block",datetime:"YYYY-MM-DD",state:"_false_",tagExclude:"") <$vars state="""$state$"""> <$set name="qualstate" filter="[!prefix[_false_]]" value=<> emptyValue=<> > <$reveal type="match" state=<> text="visible" animate="yes" class="listreveal-open"> <> <$reveal type="nomatch" state="$:/config/listreveal-mode" text="edit"> <$transclude tiddler="""$title$""" mode="$mode$"/> <$reveal type="match" state="$:/config/listreveal-mode" text="edit"> <$edit tiddler="""$title$""" class="listreveal-edit-text"/> <$macrocall $name="listreveal-meta" tiddler="""$title$""" datetime="""$datetime$"""/> \end \define listreveal-meta(tiddler,datetime) {{$:/core/images/file}}<$view tiddler="""$tiddler$""" field="creator"/><$view tiddler="""$tiddler$""" field="created" format="date" template="""$datetime$"""/> <> \end \define listreveal-showmodified(tiddler,datetime) {{$:/core/images/edit-button}}<$view tiddler="""$tiddler$""" field="modifier"/><$view tiddler="""$tiddler$""" field="modified" format="date" template="""$datetime$"""/> \end \define listrevealBtnEdit(class:"") <$reveal type="nomatch" state="$:/config/listreveal-mode" text="edit"> <$wikify name="tt" text=<>> <$button set="$:/config/listreveal-mode" setTo="edit" tooltip=<> class="te-btn-big locked $class$">{{$:/core/images/locked-padlock}} <$reveal type="match" state="$:/config/listreveal-mode" text="edit"> <$wikify name="tt" text=<>> <$button set="$:/config/listreveal-mode" setTo="locked" tooltip=<> class="te-btn-big unlocked $class$"><$action-sendmessage $message="tm-auto-save-wiki"/>{{$:/core/images/unlocked-padlock}} \end " }, "$:/plugins/telmiger/listreveal/readme": { "title": "$:/plugins/telmiger/listreveal/readme", "created": "20170222172249206", "creator": "Thomas Elmiger", "modified": "20190426075256099", "modifier": "Thomas Elmiger", "tags": "Listreveal", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "!! Good to Know A list of things you should know about this plugin. Click the ellipsis button on the right […] to see more. Use this button to enable editing: <>

Version 0.3.30 * Fixed a bug on node.js, where ~$:/state tiddlers disappear on reload. * Search fields do no longer get automatic focus – configurable via listrevealSearch’s parameter (id:"search",focus:''"yes"'') * Plugin support tab and other minor improvements." }, "$:/plugins/telmiger/listreveal/support": { "title": "$:/plugins/telmiger/listreveal/support", "created": "20190310223248028", "creator": "Thomas Elmiger", "modified": "20190426075256095", "modifier": "Thomas Elmiger", "tags": "", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "{{$:/plugins/telmiger/support}}" }, "$:/plugins/telmiger/listreveal/tags": { "title": "$:/plugins/telmiger/listreveal/tags", "created": "20160915193628399", "creator": "Thomas Elmiger", "datetime": "", "modified": "20190426075256091", "modifier": "Thomas Elmiger", "tags": "$:/tags/Macro ToDoComponents Listreveal", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "\define lrTaglist(tiddler:"_false_") <$vars target="""$tiddler$""">

    " }, "$:/plugins/telmiger/support": { "title": "$:/plugins/telmiger/support", "created": "20181103150753927", "creator": "Thomas Elmiger", "modified": "20190426075256079", "modifier": "Thomas Elmiger", "tags": "", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "!! Support the Author ''Hi!'' I’m Thomas, the author of [[tid.li/tw5/plugins.html|https://tid.li/tw5/plugins.html]]. Feedback is always welcome, as well as funding for maintenance, support and new projects :) --- !!! One Time Support If using my plugins just makes you happy, consider a one time payment via ~PayPal to reward the effort: https://www.paypal.me/telmiger --- !!! Permanent Support If my tools make you more productive or save you time in your job or your everyday life, you can support me as a Patron: https://www.patreon.com/telmiger --- !!! Thank You Substantial parts of my availabe time go to the deveopment of useful plugins for [[TiddlyWiki|https://tiddlywiki.com/]]. – Many others do the same and I would like to thank them all, especially [[Jeremy Ruston|https://tiddlywiki.com/#JeremyRuston]] and all the active members of the community! //Hereby I promise to share future revenues (if any) with other developers who’s works I use or who inspired me.// If you like my work, I would be very happy to hear from you. ''Thank you very much for your support!''
    //Thomas// https://thomas-elmiger.ch" } } }
